attributes.action: Stop back bench MP's from taking control of Parliament
attributes.background: Certain MP's have indicated that they wish to change the constitutional practice whereby the Government introduces legislation and wish to start introducing their own individual ideas against the will of the democratic majority of the public.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
